games.title: Anguna
games.description: A top-down fantasy action-adventure game, with 5 dungeons to explore. Anguna is a homebrew game for Gameboy Advance and Nintendo DS, featuring art by Chris Hildenbrand.

games.title: Another World
games.description: Another World, known as Out of This World in North America, is a 1991 cinematic platformer action-adventure game designed by Ã‰ric Chahi and published by Delphine Software. The game tells a story of Lester, a young scientist who, as a result of an experiment gone wrong, finds himself on a dangerous alien world where he is forced to fight for his survival.

games.title: Apotris
games.description: Apotris is a block stacking game for the Gameboy Advance! Made by akouzoukos.

games.title: Blast Arena Advance
games.description: The objective of Blast Arena Advance is to collect as many jittering yellow squares as possible, while avoiding the shrapnel thrown out by the explosions. Using your cunning and skill, ricochet the cursor against the walls of your Game Boy to outwit and evade the deadly shrapnel.

games.title: Flappy Bird
games.description: Flappy Bird GBA is a port of the insanely popular mobile game Flappy Bird. The developer wanted to make Flappy Bird for GBA as close to the original as possible. He achieved this by making the game operate in portrait mode, meaning the console must to be tilted sideways to be played.

games.title: MazezaM
games.description: MazezaM Challenge (pronounced may-zam) is a simple puzzle game based on MazezaM from Malcolm Tyrrell. You will have to go through 33 levels of mazes. You enter the maze on the left and you have to get to the exit on the right by pushing rows of blocks left and right.

games.title: Motocross Challenge
games.description: The gameplay in Motocross Challenge is very similar to that of Excitebike. Players race on a track made up of different track pieces. There are gas and boost buttons. Boosting will drain the boost meter. Using normal gas replenishes the meter.

games.title: Power Pig
games.description: You play as a pig armed with a gravity gun that allows you to carry anything on your shoulders. This gravity gun is powered by coins you collect throughout the levels.

games.title: Simonchu
games.description: An evil villain tries to conquer Simonchu Land, and has sent his hordes of monsters to terrify the little animals that live there peacefully. Simonchu, the hamster, must not allow that to happen.

games.title: Sushi the Cat
games.description: Sushi the Cat is a neat but short platformer for the GBA. Collect stars and avoid being touched by enemies.
